content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Complex (around y=-60)
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Furnace at (-27.0, -59.0) processing copper ore
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) storing iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)
- Furnace at (2.0, -56.0) processing iron plates

### Iron Processing Complex (around y=1)
- Two furnaces at (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Three wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), and (5.5, 3.5)
- Three burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), and (5.5, 2.5)

### Manufacturing Complex (around y=14)
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Multiple wooden chests at (11.5, 13.5), (14.5, 11.5), (21.5, 11.5)
- Multiple burner inserters coordinating material movement
- Connected by transport belts for material flow

### Power Generation Setup (around y=19)
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe networks connecting water supply to power generation

### Additional Infrastructure
- Multiple pipe groups throughout the map forming water distribution network
- Transport belt networks connecting various production facilities
- Multiple electricity poles forming power distribution network

ERROR TIPS

### Water Connection Errors
- Ensure you have the required pipes in inventory before attempting to connect water systems
- Verify the path between water source and destination is valid before attempting connections

### Crafting Errors
- When crafting items that require machine processing (like iron plates), ensure you have the appropriate manufacturing facilities set up
- Check if you have all required ingredients and proper crafting facilities before initiating crafting operations

### Resource Management
- Multiple mining drills are out of fuel - ensure consistent fuel supply to mining operations
- Several furnaces show "no ingredients" warnings - establish proper material supply chains

### Space Management
- Some inserters are blocked due to full output - ensure proper item flow by having adequate storage or transport systems
- Check for proper spacing between entities to allow for inserter operations
